name: mealie
description: Mealie is a self-hosted recipe management app that supports meal planning, shopping lists, and nutritional tracking. It offers multiple import methods, multi-user support, and a polished web UI.

features.title: Recipe Management
features.description: Store and organize recipes with ingredients, instructions, and photos

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import recipes from websites using URL with automatic parsing of ingredients and steps

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share recipes and meal plans with family members or roommates

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize recipes with custom tags for cuisines, dietary restrictions, or occasions

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find recipes by name, ingredient, tag, or nutritional content
